title: Way Maker
lyrics: Tone You are here Moving in our midst I worship you I worship you You are here Working in this place I worship you I worship you You are here Moving in our midst I worship you I worship you You are here Working in this place I worship you I worship you Way maker Miracle worker Promise keeper Light in the darkness darkness , My God That is who you are are  Way maker Miracle worker Promise keeper Light in the darkness darkness , My God That is who you are are You are here here Touching every heart heart I worship you you I worship you you You a a re here here Healing every heart heart I worship you you I worship you you You a a re here here Turning lives around around I worship you you I worship you you You a a re here here Mending every heart heart I worship you you I worship you you Way maker Miracle worker Promise keeper Light in the darkness darkness , My God That is who you are are  Way maker Miracle worker Promise keeper Light in the darkness darkness , My God That is who you are are  You wipe away all tears tears You mend the broken heart heart You’re the answer to it all all Jesus Jesus You wipe aw aw ay all tears tears You mend the broken heart heart You’re the answer to it al al l (to it all) Jesus Jesus  Way maker maker Miracle worker worker Promise keeper keeper Light in the darkness darkness (My God) That is who you are are  Way maker maker Miracle worker worker Promise keeper keeper Light in the darkness darkness That is who you are are You are here here Touching every life life I worship you you I worship you you You are here here Meeting every need need I worship you you I worship you you
